module.title: Manage: Customer: Rating
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>customer_ratings`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>customer_ratings` ( `customerRatingId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `customerId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `affability` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `guidability` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `growthRate` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `profitability` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `paymentMoral` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `adherence` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `uptightness` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `comment` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`customerRatingId`), KEY `customerId` (`customerId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
